question_text: Which fan configuration would be MOST effective for a mid-tower PC case with a single GPU and front-mounted radiator?
answer_options: Top intake, rear exhaust, bottom intake
Rear exhaust, top exhaust, front intake
Front exhaust, rear intake, top intake
Bottom exhaust, front intake, top intake
correct_answer: Rear exhaust, top exhaust, front intake
explanation: Front intake paired with rear and top exhaust creates positive airflow and effectively removes heat, especially when using a front radiator.
